content:
An action in Nuby express is defined as a folder in the actions subfolder of a [[controllers:Controller's]] folder. 

It contains some or all of the following:

* An [[action_script:Action Script]] - a server side Node.js script - `action.js`
* A [[action_static_folder:Static Folder]] containing any client side resources specific to the action - `static`
* A [[action_view_template:View Template]]: an EJS template, named `view.json`
* A [[action_config:Configuration file]]: `config.json`

The nature of an action is defined in the above-linked subsections. Note that it is quite possible to NOT have many of the above features; 

* A REST action will not have a view file or a static directory. 
* Many actions will not need specific client side files, and won't need a static directory.
